Touchless Flush Toilets
 The KOHLER touchless toilet is the no-touch flush. Just hold your hand over 
the tank sensor to activate the flush. No handle to touch means fewer germs 
to pick up or leave behind.  
 Touchless Unit
 Proprietary 
Formulated Yellow 
Seal
GP1059291
 YOUR CAP COLOR  
DOES NOT ...
